name: World Cup Soccer Finals: 1994 Trivia Game | FIFA World Cup | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Brazil.

	Brazil beat Italy on penalties in the final.

questions.text: Which team was beaten in the first game of the tournament?
questions.explanation:
Bolivia.

	They were beaten by Germany 1-0.

questions.text: Which of these teams was not in the same group as the USA?
questions.explanation:
Spain.

	Spain was in the group with Germany, South Korea and Bolivia.

questions.text: Argentina finished third out of four teams in the group stages.
questions.explanation:
True.

	They still went through to the next round as best third placed team.

questions.text: Who scored USA's first goal of the tournament?
questions.explanation:
Wynalda.

	He scored against Switzerland in the 1-1 draw.

questions.text: In which round was Saudi Arabia eliminated?
options: None of them - they never qualified for the Finals

questions.text: Who did Brazil beat 3-2 in the quarter-finals?
Which of these cities did not host a match involving the USA?
questions.explanation:
Dallas.

	Los Angeles 2 (Romania and Colombia), Detroit 1 (Switzerland), San Francisco 1 (Brazil 2nd round)

questions.text: Which four teams were involved in the two semi-finals?
questions.explanation:
Brazil - Italy - Sweden - Bulgaria.

	Italy beat Bulgaria 2-0 and Brazil beat Sweden 1-0.

questions.text: Which of these are the true statistics of the tournament?
questions.correct: 141 goals, 52 games, 15 sendings off, 1 own goal
options: 160 goals, 48 games, 7 sendings off, 3 own goals
129 goals, 48 games, 12 sendings off, 2 own goals
138 goals, 52 games, 11 sendings off, 2 own goals
questions.explanation:
141 goals, 52 games, 15 sendings off, 1 own goal.

	The 1 own goal was scored by the ill fated Colombian, Escobar who after the Finals was murdered due to his mistake.
